column4: thundr... no clue... I'm not a gamer... but my kids are. I just thought it neat that someone made a game distro. In fact, I started to D/L for them, but the server was way slow. I aborted a couple minutes into the D/L.
I'm liking Ubuntu bunches. But goddess... I guess I'm going to have to learn cli if I install.
you dont HAVE to learn the command line....and the helpful stuff you can learn bit by bit
i used to use windows 3.11 dont feel bad
